description.en: Learn the correct placement of frequency adverbs (never, rarely, sometimes, often, always) before regular verbs and after auxiliary verbs.
description.es: Aprende la colocación correcta de los adverbios de frecuencia (never, rarely, sometimes, often, always) antes de verbos normales y después de auxiliares.

prompt.en: He never buys expensive clothes.
prompt.es: Él nunca se compra ropa cara.

exercises.solution: He never buys expensive clothes.

tip.en: Frequency adverbs go BEFORE regular verbs: Subject + frequency adverb + verb. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.
tip.es: Los adverbios de frecuencia van ANTES de verbos normales: Sujeto + adverbio de frecuencia + verbo. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.

prompt.en: She rarely goes to the cinema.
prompt.es: Rara vez ella va al cine.

exercises.solution: She rarely goes to the cinema.

tip.en: Frequency adverbs go BEFORE regular verbs: Subject + frequency adverb + verb. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.
tip.es: Los adverbios de frecuencia van ANTES de verbos normales: Sujeto + adverbio de frecuencia + verbo. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.

prompt.en: He sometimes goes out for a meal.
prompt.es: A veces él sale a comer.

exercises.solution: He sometimes goes out for a meal.

tip.en: Frequency adverbs go BEFORE regular verbs: Subject + frequency adverb + verb. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.
tip.es: Los adverbios de frecuencia van ANTES de verbos normales: Sujeto + adverbio de frecuencia + verbo. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.

prompt.en: I often fall asleep on the sofa.
prompt.es: Me duermo en el sofá a menudo.

exercises.solution: I often fall asleep on the sofa.

tip.en: Frequency adverbs go BEFORE regular verbs: Subject + frequency adverb + verb. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.
tip.es: Los adverbios de frecuencia van ANTES de verbos normales: Sujeto + adverbio de frecuencia + verbo. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.

prompt.en: I always have a shower first thing in the morning.
prompt.es: Siempre me ducho a primera hora de la mañana.

exercises.solution: I always have a shower first thing in the morning.

tip.en: Frequency adverbs go BEFORE regular verbs: Subject + frequency adverb + verb. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.
tip.es: Los adverbios de frecuencia van ANTES de verbos normales: Sujeto + adverbio de frecuencia + verbo. Never, rarely, sometimes, often, always.

prompt.en: I am never late.
prompt.es: Nunca llego tarde.

exercises.solution: I am never late.

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs (be, have, can, will, etc.), frequency adverbs go AFTER the auxiliary: Subject + auxiliary + frequency adverb.
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares (be, have, can, will, etc.), los adverbios de frecuencia van DESPUÉS del auxiliar: Sujeto + auxiliar + adverbio de frecuencia.

prompt.en: I can rarely get away.
prompt.es: Rara vez me puedo escapar.

exercises.solution: I can rarely get away.

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs (be, have, can, will, etc.), frequency adverbs go AFTER the auxiliary: Subject + auxiliary + frequency adverb.
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares (be, have, can, will, etc.), los adverbios de frecuencia van DESPUÉS del auxiliar: Sujeto + auxiliar + adverbio de frecuencia.

prompt.en: He is sometimes wrong.

exercises.solution: He is sometimes wrong.

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs (be, have, can, will, etc.), frequency adverbs go AFTER the auxiliary: Subject + auxiliary + frequency adverb.
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares (be, have, can, will, etc.), los adverbios de frecuencia van DESPUÉS del auxiliar: Sujeto + auxiliar + adverbio de frecuencia.
